description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve the efficiency of energy use in small and medium enterprises, by scaling-up commercial bank lending for energy efficiency investments. The global environmental objective is to reduce Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions through the removal of barriers to energy efficiency financing in the small and medium enterprises (SMEs) sector.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Eligibility of Sub-borrowers | Description :A Sub-loan shall be made only to a sub-borrower that satisfiescriteria including that the sub-borrower is: (i) an SME; (ii) a Mid-Cap Company; (iii) a Leasing Company; (iv) an ESCO; or (v) aVendor. Other criteria are listed in Loan Agreement Schedule 2 Section I B-7. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Eligibility of Sub-borrowers | Description :A Sub-loan shall be made only to a sub-borrower that satisfiescriteria including that the sub-borrower is: (i) an SME; (ii) a Mid-Cap Company; (iii) a Leasing Company; (iv) an ESCO; or (v) aVendor. Other criteria are listed in Loan Agreement Schedule 2 Section I B-7. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Eligibility of Sub-borrowers | Description :A Sub-loan shall be made only to a sub-borrower that satisfiescriteria including that the sub-borrower is: (i) an SME; (ii) a Mid-Cap Company; (iii) a Leasing Company; (iv) an ESCO; or (v) aVendor. Other criteria are listed in Loan Agreement Schedule 2 Section I B-7. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Eligibility of Sub-projects | Description :A Sub-loan shall be given for a Sub-project which is determined, onthe basis of an appraisal carried out in accordance with procedures acceptable to the Bank and in accordance with the provisions ofLoan Agreement Schedule 2, Section I B-8 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Eligibility of Sub-projects | Description :A Sub-loan shall be given for a Sub-project which is determined, onthe basis of an appraisal carried out in accordance with procedures acceptable to the Bank and in accordance with the provisions ofLoan Agreement Schedule 2, Section I B-8 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Eligibility of Sub-projects | Description :A Sub-loan shall be given for a Sub-project which is determined, onthe basis of an appraisal carried out in accordance with procedures acceptable to the Bank and in accordance with the provisions ofLoan Agreement Schedule 2, Section I B-8 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Limit on Loan Amount | Description :Limit each Sub-loan to: (a) Sub-project Sponsor that is an SME shall notexceed $3,500,000; (b) Sub-project Sponsor that is a Mid-Cap Company, a Leasing Company or an ESCO shall not exceed $5,000,000; and(c) a Sub-Project Sponsor that is a Vendor shall not exceed $10,000,000. The aggregate principal amount under multiple Sub-loansmade by the

Finance Agreement :Limit on Loan Amount | Description :Limit each Sub-loan to: (a) Sub-project Sponsor that is an SME shall notexceed $3,500,000; (b) Sub-project Sponsor that is a Mid-Cap Company, a Leasing Company or an ESCO shall not exceed $5,000,000; and(c) a Sub-Project Sponsor that is a Vendor shall not exceed $10,000,000. The aggregate principal amount under multiple Sub-loansmade by the

Finance Agreement :Limit on Loan Amount | Description :Limit each Sub-loan to: (a) Sub-project Sponsor that is an SME shall notexceed $3,500,000; (b) Sub-project Sponsor that is a Mid-Cap Company, a Leasing Company or an ESCO shall not exceed $5,000,000; and(c) a Sub-Project Sponsor that is a Vendor shall not exceed $10,000,000. The aggregate principal amount under multiple Sub-loansmade by the

Limit on Loan Amounts to Mid-caps and Leasing companies Description: Not more than 27.5% of the Loan proceeds shall be madeavailable through Sub-loans to Sub-project Sponsors that are Mid-cap Companies; and not more than 20% of the Loan proceeds shall bemade available, through Sub-loans to Sub-project Sponsors that are Leasing Companies, which are Subsidiaries of the Borrower.

Limit on Loan Amounts to Mid-caps and Leasing companies Description: Not more than 27.5% of the Loan proceeds shall be madeavailable through Sub-loans to Sub-project Sponsors that are Mid-cap Companies; and not more than 20% of the Loan proceeds shall bemade available, through Sub-loans to Sub-project Sponsors that are Leasing Companies, which are Subsidiaries of the Borrower.

Limit on Loan Amounts to Mid-caps and Leasing companies Description: Not more than 27.5% of the Loan proceeds shall be madeavailable through Sub-loans to Sub-project Sponsors that are Mid-cap Companies; and not more than 20% of the Loan proceeds shall bemade available, through Sub-loans to Sub-project Sponsors that are Leasing Companies, which are Subsidiaries of the Borrower.

Associated GHG reductions from project investments (Tons of CO2e/ year)
Percentage of active loans to women-owned businesses

actual.value: Set of recommendations prepared and partially adopted
